<div class="treeview"><onlyinclude>
***{{nbt|list|recipes}} A list of all recipes the player has seen.
****{{nbt|string}}: the name of a recipe, for instance <code>minecraft:gold_nugget</code> or <code>minecraft:gold_ingot_from_nuggets</code>
***{{nbt|list|toBeDisplayed}} A list of all recipes the player has unlocked, but not viewed in the crafting helper yet.
****{{nbt|string}}: the name of a recipe, for instance <code>minecraft:gold_nugget</code> or <code>minecraft:gold_ingot_from_nuggets</code>
***{{nbt|byte|isFilteringCraftable}}: 0 or 1 (true/false). True if the player has enabled the "Show Craftable" feature in the crafting recipe book.
***{{nbt|byte|isGuiOpen}}: 0 or 1 (true/false). True if the player has the crafting recipe book GUI open.
***{{nbt|byte|isFurnaceFilteringCraftable}}: 0 or 1 (true/false). True if the player has enabled the "Show Smeltable" feature in the smelting recipe book.
***{{nbt|byte|isFurnaceGuiOpen}}: 0 or 1 (true/false). True if the player has the smelting recipe book GUI open.
***{{nbt|byte|isBlastingFurnaceFilteringCraftable}}: 0 or 1 (true/false). True if the player has enabled the "Show Blastable" feature in the blasting recipe book.
***{{nbt|byte|isBlastingFurnaceGuiOpen}}: 0 or 1 (true/false). True if the player has the blasting recipe book GUI open.
***{{nbt|byte|isSmokerFilteringCraftable}}: 0 or 1 (true/false). True if the player has enabled the "Show Smokable" feature in the smoking recipe book.
***{{nbt|byte|isSmokerGuiOpen}}: 0 or 1 (true/false). True if the player has the smoking recipe book GUI open.
</onlyinclude></div><noinclude>
